Oil-based ink is odorless, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $4.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:57:57 UTC – Details)



Package includes 4 pieces of fine point black permanent markers, suitable for applying in a home, gardening, work, and other kinds of long-term marking work, which can meet your daily needs.
Mr. Pen garden marker is made of opaque ink that is chemically stable, lightfast, and quick-dry. Oil-based ink is odorless, non-toxic, acid-free, and environmentally friendly.
Durable fine round nib allows smooth and precise application. Our permanent pen markers that are short in size and have smooth and quick drying ink, can optimize your writing experience.
Mr. Pen garden markers are ideal for working on multiple surfaces; they can be applied to paintings, ceramics, wood, leather, plastic, fabric, canvas, stone, glass, metal, chalkboard, craft supplies, etc.
They are suitable for vegetable seedlings, greenhouses, gardening projects, pot experiments, etc. They will help you never lose track of what you planted.

Price: $4.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:57:57 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Humidifiers 250ML & 2L

Humidifiers 4L & 6L

Tank Cleaners & Heating Pads

Heating Pads & Massagers

Heating Wrap & Spin Scrubbers

THE PERFECT BALANCE BETWEEN POWER AND PORTABILITY: The lightweight compact, slim design makes it the perfect choice for any environment. A great humidifier for bedroom, office, baby room, or car, just turn it on, and enjoy better, healthier air
BOOST COMFORT LEVELS INSTANTLY: The ultrasonic cool mist humidifier comes with two mist modes – continuous & intermittent – able to change the environmental humidity in minutes. An intuitive one-button control, without needless and complicated settings, and an auto shut-off feature for your safety and calmness
INSTANT DRYNESS FIXER: YOUR LUNGS WILL THANK YOU! Our brand new humidifier for bedroom or office incorporates an elegant, compact design, making it super-portable and easy to use. Erie desk humidifier will fine-tune the humidity levels of your surroundings, allowing you to breathe a healthier air, and make your environment a lot more pleasant
SLEEP TIGHT: While you are sound asleep, our humidifiers for bedrooms moisturize the room at the 38dB noise level. The unit is as quiet as a ticking clock
SILENT STEALTHY FUNCTION FOR DREAMY NIGHTS: Great for sleeping, it also doubles as a night-light! Soft on your eyes, this nifty little feature makes it the ideal humidifier to use at night or as a baby humidifier for nursery, offering a relaxed, quiet environment for a sound and healthy sleep.
1-YEAR WARRANTY: RISK-FREE PURCHASE & HASSLE-FREE REPLACEMENT. Please don’t hesitate to reach out. We would be more than willing to assist! Just a little tip: to increase the life of the humidifier, we recommend using GENIANI Cotton Sticks.

Geniani Erie Humidifier

Introducing the newest innovation of air humidifiers for home or office!

The Erie Humidifier is a compact, yet powerful instant dryness fixer. Now you can have the capabilities of a room humidifier in a fabulous portable version. The mini humidifier also helps with the relief of allergy symptoms and dry cough.

Key features:

  • Sleek design & smart features
  • Portable, yet powerful
  • Offers up to 8 hours runtime
  • Silent action & night-light feature
  • Cost-effective compared to larger versions

Maintenance couldn’t be simpler!

Just a little effort to refill

The Erie personal humidifier can be refilled in seconds. Gently, with a single movement, unscrew the humidifier clockwise to fill it with water.

All-day or All-night Performance

You won’t have to worry about frequent refills since its 0.06 gal (250 ml) capacity is enough to last an entire office day, or night’s sleep.

Convenience at its best

This silent humidifier is such a great addition to an office, quietly working its magic for better air. It’s powered by most USB ports or sockets. Please note. The humidifier is not equipped with a battery; it is powered by a USB cord only.

One-button Control

Simple and intuitive one-button control to switch between operating modes. No hassle, just simple for optimal convenience.

Read more

Dry air is a definite plant killer. Just like your lungs need fresher air, so do most plants need a certain level of humidity to thrive. This small humidifier for plants will keep the air at optimum humidity level, so your lovely plants will have all the moisture they need to flourish.

At home – Perfect. At the office – Perfect. In the car – Perfect

Moisturize your skin

Moisturizing helps your skin stay young and reduces the chances of skin problems.

Safe for babies

With auto-shut off and a unique nightlight function, our humidifier is a nursery room must have! Ensure your children are receiving quality air throughout the night.

Quiet like breath

Ultra-quiet <30dB operating mode to deliver utterly silent operation.

Fits on cup holder

Designed in a sleek round style which allows it to fit in small spaces such as vehicle cup holders.

Read more

POTTED SUCCULENTS SIZE: The artificial potted plants measure 2.2″ x 2.4″ x 3.3″ (56 x 62 x 85mm). These indoor fake plant decorations are small but super cute. If you want to decorate your office or room with large plants, these cute decorations may not be the best fit
LOCATIONS: Small fake plants are a perfect decorative addition to your desk, living room, bedroom, bathroom, modern home office, dining room, coffee table, side table, wall rack, bookshelf, desk, or TV area. It’s also perfect for a bedside table, window sill, or fireplace
EASY TO CARE FOR: Fake plants do not require much maintenance or care. They will not wither or fade and only need to be gently wiped occasionally using a damp cloth
COME AND HAVE THIS LOVELY SUCCULENT：Adorable succulents are the perfect room decoration for a modern decorative aesthetic. It’s also a perfect purple gifts for women. From the brand

Bring Nature To Your Home

We are committed to sharing the joy of gardening and promoting care for nature.

Amazing Creation has a mission of spreading the joy of gardening and promoting a love of nature by offering simple yet modern and elegant, easy-to-use, save spacer, colorful, versatile placement options, BPA free, weather-resistant, and innovative design. We’ve designed our planters to function efficiently in taking care of your plants and nature.

Stackable Planter

Save space by growing vertically. These unique pots are designed to be able to stacked upon one another, saving your valuable space!

Self Watering Planter

Self-watering pot that you can leave for up to 2 weeks. Provides a constant water supply that help your plants thrive.

Round Garden Planters

Featuring a stone blast finish and a modern, round design. Perfect choice for your favorite floral arrangements!

Bamboo Roasting Sticks

Multipurpose 30-inch bamboo roasting sticks, perfect to keep your children at a safe distance from the open flame.

Herb Planters & Roasting Stick

Versatile Placement Options – The window planter boxes are perfect for indoor and outdoor gardening. Our planter pots make it easy to grow your favorite plants or herbs, also a windowsill planter

item.title: Braiding Sweetgrass: Indigenous Wisdom, Scientific Knowledge and the Teachings of Plants
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) A New York Times Bestseller A Washington Post Bestseller Named a “Best Essay Collection of the Decade” by Literary Hub As a botanist, Robin Wall Kimmerer has been trained to ask questions of nature with the tools of science. As a member of the Citizen Potawatomi Nation, she embraces the ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $9.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:46:42 UTC – Details)


A New York Times Bestseller
A Washington Post Bestseller
Named a “Best Essay Collection of the Decade” by Literary Hub

As a botanist, Robin Wall Kimmerer has been trained to ask questions of nature with the tools of science. As a member of the Citizen Potawatomi Nation, she embraces the notion that plants and animals are our oldest teachers. In Braiding Sweetgrass, Kimmerer brings these two lenses of knowledge together to take us on “a journey that is every bit as mythic as it is scientific, as sacred as it is historical, as clever as it is wise” (Elizabeth Gilbert).

Drawing on her life as an indigenous scientist, and as a woman, Kimmerer shows how other living beings―asters and goldenrod, strawberries and squash, salamanders, algae, and sweetgrass―offer us gifts and lessons, even if we’ve forgotten how to hear their voices. In reflections that range from the creation of Turtle Island to the forces that threaten its flourishing today, she circles toward a central argument: that the awakening of ecological consciousness requires the acknowledgment and celebration of our reciprocal relationship with the rest of the living world. For only when we can hear the languages of other beings will we be capable of understanding the generosity of the earth, and learn to give our own gifts in return.

From the Publisher
